page.title: 09FARMING
page.content:
The public as a whole, contary to previous views, seems to get on very well with the farmers and it seems to be a very co_operative area.A sore topic with some people is farm smells but most people have got used to them.
As the size of farms has got larger there are now many old farm houses which have been taken over by new people moving into the area. This has meant that an increasing number of people are now less familiar with the farming way of life.
One difficulty between the public and the farmers is the problem of large farm machinery on the very narrow lanes. This often seemed to be a cause of irritation to the local non_farming residents.
